text: Mohammed El Berkani or Elberkani (born 13 December 1982 in Heerlen) is a Dutch retired footballer of Moroccan descent. ==Club career== El Berkani played professional football in Holland for Roda JC and Fortuna Sittard and moved abroad to play for Lierse in Belgium. He then crossed borders again to play in Germany for Carl Zeiss Jena,Carl Zeiss Jena verpflichtet El Berkani - Focus Sportfreunde SiegenSportfreunde Siegen: Neuzugang Mohamed El Berkani verpflichtet - Der Westen and Erzgebirge Aue.El Berkani verlässt Aue - Kicker In summer 2009 he joined Belgian third-tier side ViséEl Berkani devrait signer à Visé - Walfoot and in 2012 he signed a contract with OC Khouribga in the Moroccan First Division until 2014. He returned to Holland to play for amateur side EHC in 2013 and later played for GSV'28 and Eikenderveld. In September 2016 he joined the coaching staff of EHC's U-19 team.Mo El Berkani gaat aan de slag bij EHC/Heuts O19 - EHC ==Personal life== El Berkani also holds Moroccan citizenship. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:People from Heerlen Category:Dutch people of Moroccan descent Category:Association football wingers Category:Dutch footballers Category:Roda JC Kerkrade players Category:Fortuna Sittard players Category:Lierse S.K. players Category:FC Carl Zeiss Jena players Category:Sportfreunde Siegen players Category:FC Erzgebirge Aue players Category:C.S. title: Mohammed El Berkani
